notes.title: Ethics approval, guidelines and consent to participate
notes.p: The plant material (Jinqiao No. 2) was a Tartary buckwheat cultivar in China, which was collected by our lab (Research Center of Buckwheat Industry Technology of Guizhou Normal University, Guiyang, Guizhou, China). All authors stated that this study comply with the Chinese legislation and the Convention on the Trade in Endangered Species of Wild Fauna and Flora.

notes.title: Competing interests
notes.p: The authors declare that they have no competing interests.
